description: Similar meaning to 'lu'. Used as internet slang to describe the act of petting animals.

examples.translation: I really want to squish those cheeks.
Saw a Golden Retriever and petted it enthusiastically.

examples.chinese: 可可爱爱的,真的被治愈,太好rua了
examples.translation: So cute, really healing, just want to pet it.
I really want to go pet some cats and dogs right now.
